item.heading: Market Order
item.description: An order to buy or sell a stock at the best available price. Generally, this type of order will be executed immediately

item.heading: Limit Order
item.description: An order to buy or sell a stock at a specific price or better

item.heading: GFD
item.description: An order which is valid only for the same day on which it is placed

item.heading: IOC
item.description: In an IOC order, if an order released into the market fails to get executed due to a price mismatch, it is immediately cancelled

item.heading: Smart Order Routing
item.description: An automated order system that ensures price discovery
